headline: A Sometimes Tumultuous but Never Boring Era of Superstars, Growth and Lockouts
abstract: The longtime commissioner received acclaim for building the league into a vital global business, but he also was at the center of contentious disputes.
lead_paragraph: David Joel Stern was born in Manhattan on Sept. 22, 1942.
